mention.text: a letter to the great leader president kim il-song
the name of the peruvian people
the u.s. imperialists who unleashed on june 25 , 1950 , a war of aggression against the newly-founded dprk which was pursuing a peace policy
the korean people guided by the respected marshal kim il-song
